docs.title: Welcome to bootleg.technology!
docs.text:
bootleg.technology is my home for any assorted writings that don't fit onto my main site (primarily details of my homelab).

Want to know what I'm up to in terms of work and broader projects? Check out my main site.

docs.title: Nodes
docs.text:
My Kubernetes cluster consists of the following nodes, all running as VMs on my Proxmox cluster.

Control plane nodes are dedicated to running just the core Kubernetes services (kube-apiserver, kube-controller-manager, kube-scheduler, and etcd) as well as a few misc. DaemonSets. All actual workloads are only scheduled on the worker nodes, to ensure the control plane remains stable.

Name Role CPU Memory Disk Host k8s-control-plane-1 Control plane 2 cores 4GB 80GB aphrodite k8s-control-plane-2 Control plane 2 cores 4GB 80GB apollo k8s-control-plane-3 Control plane 2 cores 4GB 80GB zeus k8s-worker-1 Worker 2 cores 8GB 80GB aphrodite k8s-worker-2 Worker 2 cores 8GB 80GB apollo k8s-worker-3 Worker 2 cores 8GB 80GB zeus k8s-worker-4 Worker 2 cores 8GB 80GB helios k8s-worker-5 Worker 2 cores 8GB 80GB eos Total 16 cores 52GB 640GB

docs.title: Network
docs.text:
The following devices are powering the network for my homelab:

Device Usage Bell Home Hub 3000 (Sagemcom F@st 5566) ISP-provided modem & router. Currently used to convert the incoming fibre line into ethernet for use with downstream devices. UniFi Dream Machine Pro Router & UniFi controller. UniFi nanoHD Wireless access point. UniFi Standard 24-port PoE Switch (USW-24-POE) Switch for all ethernet devices. 
graph TD

    homehub["Bell Home Hub 3000 (Sagemcom F@st 5566)"]
    udmpro["UniFi Dream Machine Pro"]

    nanohd-- WiFi --> wifi_clients

docs.title: Storage
docs.text:
For my homelab, the majority of storage for workloads is provided by my NAS - a Synology DS920+, with the following disks:

  • 4x 4TB Seagate Ironwolf (ST4000VN008-2DR166)
    • Running in Synology Hybrid Raid in 1 drive fault tolerance mode (equivalent to RAID 5)
    • 12TB usable capacity
  • 2x 1TB Samsung 970 Evo Plus
    • Running in RAID 1
    • 1TB usable capacity
    • Used as a SSD cache for the main volume
